description: This active Boxer Brief base layer features The Original 3D Pouch ?and offers a snugger feel with a thicker waistband that’s perfect for watersports and those with an active lifestyle. The breathable mesh is optimal for men who require both support and air flow. Plus, they're made from 100% post-consumer recycled plastic bottles so you can feel good about feeling good.
name: Entourage Boxer Brief - Mens

specs.value: All BN3TH fabrics are soft and made from a performance stretch fabric. If your measurements are between sizes, select a larger size for a looser fit or a smaller size for a tighter fit
